Typo in a tournament
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Typo in a tournament
By Tenku on Wednesday, February 27, 2002 - 12:58 pm:

I'm not sure if this is really important, but in the Blossom Cup, they spell it Blossum Cup. But the lady that introduces the cup calls it the Blossom Cup. If you go to the class B tournaments, you will find it.

I just was wondering if they spelled it wrong on purpose.

By Automaton on Tuesday, March 5, 2002 - 11:29 am:

The Monster Rancher translation team is pretty notorious for it's "engrish" skills. I tend to overlook that though, in favor of just focusing on the gameplay. Remember, these are the people that had "mosnter" repeatedly during the course of MR1.
